name: AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableAppianAIForSummarization_v1_default
description: This rule represents whether to use Native AI for text summarization.
sail_code:
/*DESCRIPTION: This rule represents whether to use Native AI for text summarization.


DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: This toggle is enabled.

EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean

Change this to false() to disable usage of Native AI for text summarization */
true()
